title: Waiting
excerpt: Sitting in a doctor's waiting room (or airport), on the metro commuting to work, in line at the local cafe—what do you resort to?

children.text: Sitting in a doctor's waiting room (or airport), on the metro commuting to work, in line at the local cafe—what do you resort to?
Do you find yourself incessantly reacting to social media posts, tweets or comments?
Or stairing at empty space, trying to avoid eye contact with those around you.
Or watching less-than-breaking irrelevant but flashy news or videos on your phone?
Seeing the world as it is, making a (small, positive) difference in your community, contributing to something that might stand the test of time.
